title: Riot's Mystery Gift?
body: I logged in today and got a mystery gift from Rito; I think. I clicked continue but I don't think it said anything specific about what I got. Anybody know how to check what I got or if it was bugged?

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it looks like this was the *Mark of the Star Guardian Icon*. You should be able to equip it now, if you'd like.

Let me know if you have any other questions! ^.^
Pretty sure I just unlocked that from doing the quiz though

Correct. Often times when we add content to your account for promotions such as this, you'll get that notification.

I hope this clears that up for you.

To check, you can go to the store, click "Account" in the top right, and then click "Purchase History." This will show you what you have received recently. Something that has an amount of "0" is a gift.

At this time, the mystery gift is likely to be one of the World's Pick'Em Summoner Icons.
it didnt show up there but thanks anyways.
fck I should've read it more closely
